### Melisa Liberman
Published Jul 1, 2022 ... In today's article, I interview Susan K. Moore who has been an independent cons

what_you_do: President of New Earth Marketing, providing website design, online marketing, SEO, and branding services. Co-founder of the Grand Connection, a platform and skill-based community for entrepreneurs.
who_you_serve: Entrepreneurs and thought leaders seeking website design, online marketing, and collaborative growth.
social_proof: B.Comm from University of Manitoba, MBA from Simon Fraser University, over 30 years of experience in marketing and entrepreneurship, produced award-winning Googol Power Math Series, co-founded one of the first Fair Trade organizations (1991), Google 5-star rating, Google AdWords Certified.
signature_programs: BrandAlign Framework, Grand Connection, Googol Power Math Series
business_focus: Creating high-conversion websites and online marketing strategies aligned with clients' brands to help entrepreneurs succeed digitally.
service_provided: Website design, SEO, branding and graphic design, consulting and coaching, ecommerce (WooCommerce), marketing automation, website maintenance, malware removal, speaking, local search marketing
